title: Blog Schema
description: A Blog is the root data class. Each blog has a series of Posts and Pages, and each Post has a series of Comments.  Blogs, Posts, Pages, and Comments are all owned by Users

kind.description: The kind of this entry. Always blog.schema.json.

name.description: The name of this blog. This is usually displayed in Blogger as the blog's title. May include HTML.

description.description: The description of this blog. This is usually displayed in Blogger underneath the blog's title. May include HTML.

published.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this blog was published.

updated.description: RFC 3339 date-time when this blog was last updated.

url.description: The URL where this blog is published.

selfLink.description: The API REST URL to fetch this resource from.

posts.description: The container for this blog's posts.

totalItems.description: The total number of posts on this blog.

selfLink.description: The URL of the Posts Collection for this blog.

items[].description: The list of posts for this Blog.

pages.description: The container for this blog's pages.

totalItems.description: The total number of pages for this blog.

selfLink.description: The URL of the Pages collection for this blog.

locale.description: The locale this blog is set to.

language.description: The language this blog is authored in.

country.description: The country this blog's locale is set to.

variant.description: The language variant this blog is authored in.

customMetaData.description: The JSON custom metadata for the blog
